import React from 'react'; import { Slide } from 'react-slideshow-image'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import './slideshow.css' import 'react-slideshow-image/dist/styles.css' const slideImages = [ 'images/armbanden/Rood_hardjes.jpg', 'images/armbanden/Rood_hardjes.jpg', 'images/slide_4.jpg' ]; const Slideshow = () => { return (
Card Title Card Subtitle Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content. Card Link Another Link
) }; export default Slideshow;
